attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore to receive honour for raising funds for NHS.
attributes.additional_details: Caption Tom Moore is 99 years of age and is an inspiration to us all.
attributes.background: Honour Captain Tom Moore for raising over £8 million for the NHS.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
